channel.title: vcdx-cloud on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in vcdx-cloud on DefinIT

item.title: My #VCDX-CMA defense experience
item.description: Yesterday, I received the dreaded email We regret to inform you that your attempt to achieve VCDX certification on June 09-11, 2015 in Frimley, UK was unsuccessful. It wasn’t entirely unexpected, but somehow I still hoped my assessment of the defense was pessimistic and so it was nonetheless disappointing. It’s a big hit to not achieve something I have been focusing on for months and it is hard not to feel embarrassed that I didn’t make the grade.
